name: Dragoon's Road
text:
This card is always treated as a "Omni" spell. Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can activate one of these effects: 
? Special Summon 1 Omni monster from your hand, Deck, or GY. 
? Discard 1 card; Special Summon a "Dragoon" Fusion Monster from you Extra Deck. (This Special Summon is treated as a Fusion Summon.)
Each "Dragoon" monster's you control cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects once per turn.
